mapper.insert: insert into invoice_log (id, invoice_num, event_type, stamp, bill, handler, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bill,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update invoice_log set invoice_num = #{invoiceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_type = #{eventType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stamp = #{stamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bill = #{bill,jdbcType=INTEGER}, handler = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, invoice_num, event_type, stamp, bill, handler, remark from invoice_log
